text: Mumina to tara'i yara allah‌ o tamra rasulera upara imana ane ebam rasulera sange samastigata byapare ekatra hale tara anumati chara sare pare na; niscaya yara apanara anumati prarthana kare tara'i allah‌ ebam tamra rasulera upara imana rakhe. Ata'eba, tara tadera kono kajera jan'ya apanara anumati ca'ile tadera madhye yaderake icche apani anumati debena ebam tadera jan'ya allah‌ra kache ksama prarthana karabena. Niscaya allah‌ parama ksamasila, parama dayalu
